content: *welcome the chilly fall with this delicate afghan crochet as shown to match autumn s color palate or use other colors to match the season or your home lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80240ad skill level intermediate level 3 jiffy® article #450 2 colors 6 balls each 12 balls total crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge motif 1 = 13 x 13 in 33 x 33 cm special stitches dtr2tog picot work 32 motifs 6 different motif patterns provided sew motifs together following assembly diagram to finish due to the nature of round-shaped motifs throw has an irregular outer edge printed pattern is also available for $3 95 on the lion brand site article # 80240a 1 1 http //www lionbrand com/6030/pictpage/1922242660 html
